unnormalised: Arre, tax bhorp mhonnllear Bollywood-antleo kotha-mud'd'ddi vollkhun ghetlea bhaxen – tumkam dista tumkam te koll'lle, ani magir Income Tax Dept notice dhaddtta! 31/07 poilim submit korunk zai nam tor, penalty bharnni poddtteli, bhai!
normalised: Arre, taxes bharnu mhannje Bollywood-achi story line somzunk vavrunk zata toslem – tuka lagta tumka somzallem, ani magir Income Tax D-e-p-t notice dhaddta! Teessa zulyachi iktisaari adim submit korunk zai, nam zaar, penalty bharna padta, bhai!
